metadata.Title: CVE-2021-41261 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Galette is a membership management web application built for non profitorganizations and released under GPLv3. Versions prior to 0.9.6 are subjectto stored cross site scripting attacks via the preferences footer. Thepreference footer can only be altered by a site admin. This issue has beenresolved in the 0.9.6 release and all users are advised to upgrade. Thereare no known workarounds.

criterions.comment: galette: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
